#Import the library files
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
#Load the dataset
dataset=pd.read_csv('../input/amazon-best-book-selling/bestsellers with categories.csv')
dataset.head()
source.4b828e30:
#checking: whether the dataset has any null values or not
dataset.isnull().sum()
source.d838c070:

print(dataset['Name'].unique())
print(" ")
print("Number of books present in the dataset :- \n", dataset['Name'].value_counts())
source.fc4c13e5:

print(dataset['Genre'].unique())
print()

dataset['User Rating'].unique()
source.cea40b14:
#plotting using matplotlib library file on the basis of statistical description of the dataset
for i in dataset.describe().columns:
    sns.distplot(dataset[i].dropna())
    plt.show()
    
#Type of plotting is distplot
source.d04ef81d:
#plotting on Books names and its prices
plt.figure(figsize=(15,10))
plt.xlabel('book name')
plt.ylabel('book price')
sns.scatterplot(x='Name',y='Price',hue='Name',data=dataset)
source.8390f5c0:

plt.figure(figsize=(15,10))
plt.xlabel('Books Genres')
plt.ylabel('User ratings')
sns.scatterplot(x='Genre',y='User Rating',hue='Price',data=dataset)

plt.xlabel('Authors')

source.ead26248:
#Book details based on its user ratings using groupby method
ratings=dataset[['Name','Price','User Rating','Reviews','Year','Author']]
ratings_groupby=ratings.groupby(['Name','Price','Reviews','Year','Author']).agg(np.max)
ratings_groupby.head(7) #visualize first 7 data

source.70b5c132:
#Count highest selling prices on books
count_ratings=ratings.groupby('Price').count()
count_ratings['perc_total']=round(count_ratings['User Rating']*100/count_ratings['User Rating'].sum(),1)
count_ratings['perc_total'].plot.bar()
source.c6c04140:

count_ratings1['perc_total']=round(count_ratings1['Price']*100/count_ratings1['Price'].sum(),1)
count_ratings1['perc_total'].plot.bar()

source.f4c7f742: **Conclusion: Based on Amazon Best book sellig Data Analysis, The best book on user rating is 4.8 and price is 8.**    ![image.png](attachment:7948ca4e-a3c5-4ec6-89ce-c00ab79caf03.png)
